Name: you are pig sitter
About the game: what I can do? - you can make crops. - you can find more efficient way to grow up plant. - you can install machines so they automatic everything. - you can grow up animals from eggs. - you need to feed animals with crops. - to be pig sitter.(but up to you) - to remember lost memory. - to be rich. -Intro- He lost his memory. He love dancing. He need to live himself and luckily someone give him big land. So He need to start plow the soil and grow up plants. then harvest crops and sell and make money. In the world there are genius doctor if you could find him he helps you with making genius items. And then you can use many machines !! It helps make more plants. you can be use drone as watering crops, good idea right? once you have enough crops. oh dear you are finally pig sitter ! can be. it's up to you what eggs you buy from shops. then grow up pigs and make more money! then You can buy more bigger land than before ! so ... one day... Might be he remember his lost memory.
